data.text:
Fine Art Finder Photo Prints and Wall Art

Portrait of Louis of France (1682-1712) Duke of Burgundy, father of Louis XV

JLJ4623435 Portrait of Louis of France (1682-1712) Duke of Burgundy, father of Louis XV. Painting by Hyacinthe Rigaud (1659-1743). 18th century. Dim. 1, 29 x 0, 98 m. by Rigaud, Hyacinthe Francois (1659-1743); Musee et Domaine National de Versailles et de Trianon, Versailles, France; (add.info.: Portrait of Louis of France (1682-1712) Duke of Burgundy, father of Louis XV. Painting by Hyacinthe Rigaud (1659-1743). 18th century. Dim. 1, 29 x 0, 98 m.); Photo ePhoto Josse; French, out of copyright. Â© Josse / Bridgeman Images

Media ID 22282162

Armure Francaise Francais Homme Peinture

Framed Prints

Bring a touch of regal elegance to your home with our Framed Print of the Portrait of Louis of France, Duke of Burgundy. This stunning artwork, painted by renowned artist Hyacinthe Rigaud in the 18th century, showcases Louis in his grandeur as the father of Louis XV. The intricate details of his elaborate attire and the rich, vibrant colors of the painting are beautifully preserved in this high-quality print. Our Framed Prints come with a sleek, modern frame that enhances the artwork while adding a contemporary touch. Hang this exquisite piece in your living room, office, or as a thoughtful gift for the art enthusiast in your life.

Photo Prints

Bring history to life with the Media Storehouse range of Photographic Prints. This stunning portrait, titled "Louis of France, Duke of Burgundy (1682-1712)" by renowned artist Hyacinthe Rigaud, captures the essence of the Duke's regal presence. Originating from the 18th century, this masterpiece showcases the Duke's noble character and refined elegance. Our high-quality photographic print reproduces the intricate details and rich colors of the original painting, allowing you to enjoy this work of art in your home or office. Add a touch of classical sophistication to your space with this beautiful and authentic reproduction.

Poster Prints

Bring history to life with our exquisite Media Storehouse Poster Prints. This captivating portrait of Louis of France, Duke of Burgundy (1682-1712), father of Louis XV, is a masterpiece by renowned 18th century painter Hyacinthe Rigaud. Our high-quality poster print, featuring an image from Fine Art Finder under copyright by Photo Josse, captures the elegance and grandeur of this iconic figure in French history. Add this stunning work of art to your home or office, and let the story of the past unfold before your eyes.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the rich history and artistry of the past with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from the Media Storehouse collection. Featuring the captivating Portrait of Louis of France, Duke of Burgundy (1682-1712) by renowned artist Hyacinthe Rigaud, this puzzle brings the elegance and sophistication of the 18th century to your home. Immerse yourself in the intricate details of this masterpiece, as you piece together the image of the Duke, father of Louis XV, and add a touch of history and art to your living space. Experience the joy of puzzle solving with this beautiful and challenging puzzle from Media Storehouse.
